text: Amnesiac is an album by the band Radiohead. It was released in June 2001. It went straight to No.1 in the UK Albums Chart. Most critics gave it good reviews. Pitchfork gave it 9/10. ==Track listing== All tracks written by Radiohead. # "Packt Like Sardines in a Crushd Tin Box" – 4:00 # "Pyramid Song" – 4:49 # "Pulk/Pull Revolving Doors" – 4:07 # "You and Whose Army?" – 3:11 # "I Might Be Wrong" – 4:54 # "Knives Out" – 4:15 # "Morning Bell/Amnesiac" – 3:14 # "Dollars & Cents" – 4:52 # "Hunting Bears" – 2:01 # "Like Spinning Plates" – 3:57 # "Life in a Glasshouse" – 4:34 ==References== Category:2001 albums Category:Radiohead albums
title: Amnesiac
